articles.author: Yun Li
articles.title: History shows when Elon Musk gets negative on Tesla's stock, you should too
articles.description: Here's a look at how Tesla stock fared following Musk's comment on the shares being overvalued in the past.
articles.content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only.)
Elon Musk has put his own company's stock on blast. Believe it or not, it's not the first time the CEO has talked in negative terms about his own stock. And if history is any guide, the negative commentary could… [+288 chars]

articles.author: Taylor Locke
articles.title: Kevin O'Leary: If Elon Musk pitched Tesla on 'Shark Tank,' 'I would have said no'
articles.description: "Am I a shareholder today in Tesla? Yes I am," investor Kevin O'Leary told CNBC Make It on Wednesday. But "if Elon Musk came into the 'Shark Tank' and told me to invest in his electric car company before he started it, I would say, 'You're crazy.'"
articles.content:
Investor Kevin O'Leary, star of ABC's "Shark Tank," has said Tesla CEO Elon Musk is "a great entrepreneur."
But "if Elon Musk came into the 'Shark Tank' and told me to invest in his electric car company before he started it, I would say, 'You're crazy,'" O'L… [+2606 chars]

articles.author: Yun Li
articles.title: Bank of America downgrades Tesla, citing too high valuation after stock's recent massive run
articles.description: The bank slashed its rating on Tesla to underperform from neutral, while lowering its 12-month price target to $485 from $500.

articles.author: Jesse Pound
articles.title: Tesla is poised to beat earnings and possibly qualify for S&P 500 inclusion, Barclays says
articles.description: Tesla may post a big enough profit in the first quarter to have positive earnings over the past 12 months, Barclays said in a new note.
articles.content:
(This story is forCNBC Prosubscribers only). 
Tesla is poised to report a blowout first quarter this week that might make it profitable enough to join the S&P 500, Barclays said in a note to clients. 
Elon Musk's car company is slated to release its fir… [+120 chars]

articles.author: Maggie Fitzgerald
articles.title: Tesla shares pop after Credit Suisse upgrades stock, says company will increase electric car lead
articles.description: Credit Suisse upgraded shares of Tesla to neutral from underperform.
articles.content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only.)
The coronavirus crisis will allow Tesla to increase its lead in the electric vehicle space as other automakers focus on recovering from the economic damage due to the shutdowns, said Credit Suisse.

articles.author: Maggie Fitzgerald
articles.title: Tesla shares jump after hours as Goldman initiates with buy rating, sees rally above $800
articles.description: Goldman Sachs returned to its coverage of Tesla with a buy rating on Tuesday.

articles.author: Lora Kolodny
articles.title: Tesla board members must now rely on Elon Musk to pay legal expenses
articles.description: Tesla will forego an important type of business insurance policy this year, leaving board members at Tesla reliant on CEO Elon Musk to pay for their legal defense and settlements in many cases.
articles.content: Tesla said in a regulatory filing on Tuesday that rather than paying high premiums for it, the company would forego an important type of business insurance policy this year. The decision leaves current and future board members at Tesla reliant on CEO Elon Mus… [+3938 chars]

articles.title: Tesla reports Q1 earnings after the bell
articles.description: The Covid-19 outbreak in China forced Tesla to stop manufacturing electric vehicles in Shanghai for more than a week in February, and in the U.S. at the end of March.
articles.content:
Tesla reports first-quarter earnings on Wednesday after the bell.  
Wall Street is expecting an adjusted loss of 36 cents per share and revenue of $5.9 billion, according to a survey of analysts by Refinitiv. However, estimates varied widely, and comparing T… [+2564 chars]

articles.author: Jordan Novet
articles.title: Read the full complaint Tesla filed in federal court against California's Alameda County
articles.description: Tesla alleged in a lawsuit that California's Alameda County, where the automaker has a factory, went against state rules and "created a legal quagmire."
articles.content: Tesla on Saturday filed suit against the California's Alameda County in U.S. District Court for California's Northern District, asserting that the county is making rules that go against state policy on business closures. Tesla CEO Elon Musk said in a tweet th… [+564 chars]
